Article.ArticleTitle: Polycephalums A and B, New Anticoagulant Constituents Isolated from Clinopodium polycephalum.

AbstractText: Two previously undescribed compounds (1 and 2) were isolated from Clinopodium polycephalum, a medicinal plant distributed in southwestern and eastern China. Their structures were elucidated using MS analyses and extensive 2D-homo and heteronuclear NMR data interpretations. Both compounds 1 and 2 could significantly shorten APTT and PT, and their procoagulant effect was comparable to that of positive drugs. At the same time, compound 2 had certain antioxidant activity (IC<sub>50</sub> value of 2.25±0.05 μM in ABTS assay).
